title: [Gameplay] Renekton Stun bug
body:
When playing as Renekton against Quinn. Renekton's stun will go on cool down if Quinn uses her Q on him

Steps to reproduce 
1. Quinn uses Q on renekton
2. Renekton uses stun on Quinn
3. Renekton stun goes on cooldown.
Reproduction Rate 10/10

Video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8F9Db50kBps&feature=youtu.be

replies.body:
Hey Sa Panther410,

I appreciate you taking the time to give us a reproduce break down. It really helps me figure out what is going on. This is a bug for sure. I am looking into it. I can not promise you a timeline on when this will be fixed but I am pushing this to be handled as quickly as possible. Thank you again for taking the time to post!

Ranger XIV

> [{quoted}](name=SA panther410,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=XP0zrkOy,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-02-24T02:02:09.992+0000)
>
> Thanks a bunch!

Hello again,

So I think we have found the issue and are working on providing a fix. It will be pushed out asap and again, thanks for taking the time to post about this and help us find this problem!

Ranger XIV

#DON'T !!!!

A few patches ago you cleaned up blind effects, as far as I can tell, this is INTENDED !

Edit: source.
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-522-notes
"Empowered Basic Attack Changes"

> [{quoted}](name=Declined,realm=EUNE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=XP0zrkOy,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-26T00:54:03.916+0000)
>
> #DON'T !!!!
> 
> A few patches ago you cleaned up blind effects, as far as I can tell, this is INTENDED !
> 
> Edit: source.
> http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-522-notes
> "Empowered Basic Attack Changes"

I do not know what you mean by don't. This is a bug in the game and is not intended because Quinn's Q does not give a blind in that sense.

while you are busy fixing stuff, could you please take a look at this regarding panth's q "crits" and it's interaction with ER?

[http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/o7njuGmt-riot-why-do-panths-spear-crits-work-with-ie-passive-but-not-with-er-passive](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/o7njuGmt-riot-why-do-panths-spear-crits-work-with-ie-passive-but-not-with-er-passive)

I think it happens on all forms of cc coming from auto attacks. It happened to me when I was playing Leona top vs Quinn roughly two weeks ago. She blinded me after I E to her and I went for Q stun and it said miss. Was not sure at the time if her blind still caused people to miss auto attacks with the rework.
